title: Christmas leftovers shepherd's pie
ingredients: ['425g mashed potatoes', 'salt and pepper to taset', '225g minced lamb', '225g leftover turkey, cut into small cubes', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '225ml leftover gravy', '4 tablespoons beef stock', '1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '60g frozen garden peas', '75g grated Cheddar cheese']
